      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Do NOT call during a call to this.update or this.draw, as an IllegalStateException likely should be thrown. This is as dispose should remove all particles, but update and draw iterate through particles.

        Using a pause menu to quit from and/or an exit flag could help prevent this issue. The nebula shouldn't really being disposing of itself anyway.

        Hmm, should I add an exit() method or something like that?

        ArtistList artists()
